パッケージ org.pomodoro4j

インタフェース Pomodoro

  • すべてのスーパーインタフェース:
    BreakSupport, Serializable
    public interface Pomodoro
extends BreakSupport, Serializable
    導入されたバージョン:
    1.0.0

    • メソッドの概要

      すべてのメソッド インスタンス・メソッド abstractメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッド 説明
      long getMilliseconds()
      Returns the time in milliseconds on the pomodoro timer.
      long getNanoseconds()
      Returns the time in nanoseconds on the pomodoro timer.
      long getSplitMilliseconds()
      Returns the split time in milliseconds on the stopwatch.
      long getSplitNanoseconds()
      Returns the split time in nanoseconds on the stopwatch.
      long getStartMilliseconds()
      Returns the time this pomodoro was started in milliseconds, between the current time and midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC.
      long getStartNanoseconds()
      Returns the time this pomodoro was started in nanoseconds, between the current time and midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC.
      boolean performs()
      Starts a pomodoro set and returns true for as long as this started pomodoro set is ongoing.
      void reset()
      Resets the pomodoro set.
      void stop()
      Stops the pomodoro set.

      • インタフェースから継承されたメソッド org.pomodoro4j.BreakSupport

        endBreak, endBreakIfShould, isBreakOngoing, shouldEndBreak, shouldStartBreak, startBreak, startBreakIfShould

    • メソッドの詳細

      • performs

        boolean performs()
        Starts a pomodoro set and returns true for as long as this started pomodoro set is ongoing.
        戻り値:
        true if the Pomodoro set is ongoing, otherwise false

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stops the pomodoro set.

      • reset

        void reset()
        Resets the pomodoro set.

      • getStartMilliseconds

        long getStartMilliseconds()
        Returns the time this pomodoro was started in milliseconds, between the current time and midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC.
        戻り値:
        The time this pomodoro was started in milliseconds, between the current time and midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC

      • getStartNanoseconds

        long getStartNanoseconds()
        Returns the time this pomodoro was started in nanoseconds, between the current time and midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC.
        戻り値:
        The time this pomodoro was started in nanoseconds, between the current time and midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC

      • getMilliseconds

        long getMilliseconds()
        Returns the time in milliseconds on the pomodoro timer.

        This is either the time between the start and the moment this method is called, or the amount of time between start and stop.

        戻り値:
        The time in milliseconds

      • getNanoseconds

        long getNanoseconds()
        Returns the time in nanoseconds on the pomodoro timer.

        This is either the time between the start and the moment this method is called, or the amount of time between start and stop.

        戻り値:
        The time in nanoseconds

      • getSplitMilliseconds

        long getSplitMilliseconds()
        Returns the split time in milliseconds on the stopwatch.

        This is the time between start and latest split.

        戻り値:
        the split time in milliseconds

      • getSplitNanoseconds

        long getSplitNanoseconds()
        Returns the split time in nanoseconds on the stopwatch.

        This is the time between start and latest split.

        戻り値:
        the split time in nanoseconds
